rolit.server

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • rolit.server.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Maintains game object i.e. let players make a move and assigning the current player's turn.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Victor Lap and Yuri van Midden

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MINIMUMPLAYERS
      Minimum number of players

      Creates a new Game from the players array.

      Adds a player to the game

      Returns a string with the colors that can be chosen according to the AMULET protocol
